name: Missland 2
overview: Missland 2 is the sequel to Missland and is also a directly experiencing puzzle game by comparing scenes on the left and right and finding non-matching parts with a character. The gameplay is about moving the 3d screen using the d-pad and the zooms to find the errors between the images, when you center your character with the different object you press the X Button to get one of the errors. There is a time limit to solve each puzzle and there are different themes and images. The game got 3 game modes: 1 Player, 2 Player & Tournament (that is not playable at the beginning of the game).
